item.description:
Open Mic Night at the Tupelo showcases musicians with real talent to come up and perform a few original songs. I'd love to check this out!

Open Mic Night!

Open mic night occurs the first Thursday of each month. Its BYOB so feel free to come along with your favorite beer or beverage. Come and support touring musicians trying to get their sound out there and be entertained.

Start time is 7 pm and the admission fee is only $5.00. Come out and do something different!

I will be there 645. This is a cross meetup with the Life and Parenting After Divorce Meetup Group:

http://www.meetup.com...

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Open Mic Night at the Tupelo Music Hall
